comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
The preference architecture guide still needs quite a bit of polishing. Let me
know how you think it is shaping up

Oleg

comments.author: Michael Becke
comments.body:
Nice work on these Oleg.  I made a few minor changes, but in general everything was quite good.  
These docs have been applied to HEAD.

Mike

description:
Document the new preference architecture based on the hierarchy of HttpParams
collections, as well as available parameters and options
summary: [API Doc] Compile new preference architecture and HTTP parameterization guide
